article_title: Small business health options discussed at meeting

article_metadata.description: "SHOP is a portion of the Affordable Care Act (ObamaCare)," Donaldson said. "In 2016, the state base exchange was set up in Little Rock.”
article_metadata.author: Staff Report Stuttgart Daily Leader
